modalContent.credas: <h3>ABC 123 Solicitors</h3><p>This is some important information about <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://www.credas.co.uk/">CREDAS</a>, who we use to do the Anti-Money Laundering (AML) checks.</p><p>You will be sent an email or text message that will take you through the checks.</p><p>More words and description here.</p>
